trans-unit.source: Changes the color space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 更改的色彩空间<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 XAML 用法的信息，请参阅[ColorConvertedBitmap 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ColorConvertedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: ColorConvertedBitmap 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 属性更改才会在对象初始化过程。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>发出信号初始化已开始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>以指示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: ColorConvertedBitmap objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用创建的 ColorConvertedBitmap 对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>构造函数将自动初始化，并且将忽略属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>

trans-unit.source: A ColorConvertedBitmap is never cached.
trans-unit.target: ColorConvertedBitmap 永远不会缓存。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本使用情况，请参阅备注

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref>类通过使用指定的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
